response.original_title: Does Kraken have good customer support? {Ask^Expert}
response.overview: The overall consensus ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 on Kraken customer support is mixed, but their commitment to security is highly regarded. Kraken provides ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 24/7 support via Live Chat and its Support Center, which is faster than many competitors. Many users report ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 that support is excellent for basic queries and account verifications, often solving problems within 24 hours. However, for ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 complex issues, especially those involving frozen accounts or fund delays, some customers on review sites frequently report long wait times and unresponsive tickets. The ⟦+1⟧⇢(307)⇢⊹(256)⊹8902 company itself touts a high client satisfaction score, but users often express frustration over the difficulty of reaching a specialist for high-priority issues.
response.title: Does Kraken have good customer support? {Ask^Expert}
